profile:
At CertaPro Painters® of Toronto, ON, we know that finding the right team for your painting project can be overwhelming. With our professionals by your side, the process will be easy and convenient — leaving you time for what matters most. We Do Painting. You Do Life.™


Residential House Painting

Experience and Care at Every Stage – House Painting Services

Finding the right team to paint your home can feel overwhelming, but with CertaPro Painters® you’ll have peace of mind. We are experts in residential painting that treat your home with the care it deserves. Our home and residential painting experience is delivered with certainty in these simple steps:

Step One: We connect.

Get started on your painting project by doing a free online estimate. Our team can also come to your home and discuss additional details of your project during a time that’s convenient for your schedule.

Step Two: We consult.

Before preparing a detailed proposal, we will do a walk-through of your space. We’ll also get to know you and your home through our Certainty Pledge®, so that we can customize the way we work with your daily routine.

Step Three: We paint.

Working from your project’s detailed proposal, the painting crew will provide best-in-class service, including cleaning up at the end of each workday. A job supervisor will manage the team, deliver daily updates to you and address your feedback along the way.

Step Four: We follow up.

In addition to a final on-site inspection, an independent quality assurance team may contact you after your project is done to get feedback on your project’s final results and your overall experience with CertaPro Painters®.

Commercial Painting (Multi-Family, Industrial, Retail, Healthcare, Hospitality, Schools)

The requirements of a commercial painting project demand a disciplined and focused approach from the very start. Our team of commercial painting specialists is committed to delivering a quality experience and professional results on every project, every time.

We plan diligently.

A CertaPro Painters® estimating specialist will make an on-site visit and create a proposal that addresses the specific requirements of the RFP. Upon acceptance, we develop a project-specific plan to ensure that the process goes smoothly and that all elements of the project are executed as promised.  We have long standing relationships with our paint vendors who can provide specific job specs and warranties for each and every individual project. 

We respect the schedule.

We arrive at the job site on time and complete each day’s work when we promise we will. If off-hours work is required, or if there are any unique timing needs, we’re more than happy to accommodate them.

We respect the surroundings.

Our work is planned and executed around each property’s specific requirements, with minimized disruption to customers, employees, residents or tenants.

We manage the project so our clients don’t have to.

A job site supervisor is on site during the project to ensure that the work progresses as planned. This enables us to address any issues as they arise and keeps the work on track.

We’ll track our progress for you with and address your feedback along the way. Upon completion of your project, a final site inspection will allow you to review our work in detail.
services: We are a full service residential and commercial painting company, performing interior and exterior painting, deck staining, carpentry and drywall repair, colour consulting, wallpaper removal, wallpaper application and power washing.  Our painters are experienced craftsmen who take great pride in their work and customer care. We recognize that home and business painting is not an everyday occurrence for you. There is education and preparation that needs to occur so your project goes smoothly and according to your expectations. We do this through a process of communication and education so we can co-create the best possible painting experience with you. We call this the Certainty Service System. At CertaPro, you'll never be surprised. You can be assured that we will always deliver superior service that is on time and on budget. We are a company with a culture of respect. Respect for our employees. Respect for the environment. And most important, respect for you, our customers.
brands: Sherwin Williams, Benjamin Moore, Dulux, and all the major brands.

profile:
Thanks for visiting Pretty Painting. My name is Roger LeBlanc and I have been painting for 20 years. I take pride in my work and my ability to get the job done without compromising on it's quality. I have been growing due to word of mouth, and that has truly been an honour for me. I started this business because I love to paint, but more importantly, I wanted to charge people a fair price. I think that price inflation is infiltrating everything around us, and even though I am just one person, I want to be that one person that did what was right by those around me. My prices will never be more than they need to be. That will be my motivation for as long as I get to run my own business.
20 years of doing an honorable service is not enough, I hope to do it for 40 more.                                                                    -Roger LeBlanc

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Pretty Painting is a company built on the integrity of one man, Roger Leblanc. He was determined to one day open up a business that would shake up the industry. He started working for his uncle when he was 15 years old, and he learned from his uncle that you could do the job right without over charging. 
As he moved on in his career, he worked for multiple large companies that had very different and even opposite views and morals to that of his uncle. These companies charged 2-3 times more than what was necessary or fair for the job. That is when Roger knew he would one day open up his own business and continue what he believed was right. He wanted to create a business built on honor and integrity, and make a proper living for his family, without feeling like he stole from his clients to do so.
Finally! Pretty Painting was born and the feedback has been overwhelming. It has been a humbling experience to see how emotional customers get when they see they didn't have to pay thousands of dollars more than what was necessary to get such a spectacular job done. A job done right IS NOT based on how much monetary incentive there is. It is based on the principles of the people who provide it. 
If you are wondering where you may find a job that will meet all of your expectations and not cost you more than what is reasonable, please contact us and give us the opportunity to give you a quote. You can take the time to compare it to other places and see that the same job can have very different prices!
It's Roger's goal that you see this for yourself and not be taken advantage of. 
The growth of Pretty Painting does not equate to a company becoming wealthy, but a company helping people keep more of the money they work so hard to earn! 

______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Since our official company launch this year, we have had enormous support from our community. Our company goal is being well accepted which is to do the best possible quality job without charging those prices that come along with it. Our prices are fair, honorable and with a balance of not taking more from the customer than what is truly ethical and necessary. 
So we decided to take it a step further! if we are not the best price for the best job, then show us a quote from that cheaper registered company and we will not only match it, but we will take an additional 10% off!

profile:
We Care About the Details

Gta Home Painting has served the businesses and homes of customers in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), York region, Vaughan, Maple
and Durham area for almost 6 years, and would be honored to serve you.

We strive to provide honest, reliable, residential and commercial painting services that stand head and shoulders above the rest. We combine the industry's best paint with our passion for detail to exceed your expectations. 

If you're looking into painting your home, you may be wondering if you can just take care of the interior and exterior painting yourself.

After all, there's not much to it, right? Pick the right colors, find the right primer, and use a brush to lay the paint on the walls!

However, even just painting your interior can be a daunting, time-consuming job, and it's surprisingly easy to get wrong. Exterior painting is even harder, and brings a variety of additional challenges.

The better choice is to rely on the expert professionals at GTA Home Painting  to endure those challenges for you, and to get the job done right the first time. Call us today for a free estimate!

As a premier painting contractor, we are committed to delivering customer service that is second to none. We offer a wide range of services to meet your residential and commercial painting needs. Big job or small, we have you covered.

profile:
Welcome to Quality Painting. We offer both interior and exterior painting services for residential, commercial and industrial projects. Interior and Exterior, Popcorn ceiling removal, Drywall repair, Deck painting, Spray painting. Contact us today to schedule free estimate. 

Quality Painting is a professional painting company, proudly servicing Greater Toronto Area, North and West of Toronto. Quality Painting company is fully Licensed and Insured.

With over 15 years of experience in the painting and plastering industry  we deliver on quality workmanship, customer satisfaction, and affordability. Whether your project is large or small, we have the ability  to complete the job to high standard .
